sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mymember WHERE mem_id = #mem_id#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO mymember (mem_id, mem_name, mem_tel, mem_addr) VALUES(#mem_id#, #mem_name#, #mem_tel#, #mem_addr#)
